title: Implement Authentication System
description: Need to implement a complete authentication system with JWT tokens, refresh tokens, password hashing using bcrypt, email verification, password reset functionality, and two-factor authentication support.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Several queries are running slowly in production. Need to add proper indexes, optimize N+1 queries, implement query caching, and consider database sharding for scalability.

title: Refactor Legacy Code
description: The payment processing module was written 5 years ago and needs complete refactoring. Should use modern design patterns, add comprehensive tests, improve error handling, and update documentation.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Develop native mobile applications for iOS and Android with offline support, push notifications, biometric authentication, and seamless synchronization with the backend API.
